testCase.requirementText: The locator type is always used with the value "URL" from the vocabulary in the attribute.
testCase.description: The attribute LOCTYPE is mandatory in the METS-standard, and there are 7 possible values. Only the value "URL" is valid. Therefore we should create corpus packages with one or all of the other 6 values.

rule.description: The LOCTYPE-attribute must always have the value "URL".
